org.openimaj.text.nlp.namedentity

Class IgnoreTokenStripper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.text.nlp.namedentity.IgnoreTokenStripper

  • public class IgnoreTokenStripper
extends Object
    Class to remove stopwords from a list of tokens, or to check if a word is a stopword.
    Author:
    Laurence Willmore (lgw1e10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
